projects.name: Portfolio-GPT
projects.description: A portfolio that communicates my backend + LLM tooling work with a clear narrative and a distinct visual system.
projects.problem: My work was hard to understand quickly from a generic portfolio layout.
projects.impact: Faster iteration on messaging and project storytelling; improved hierarchy and accessibility.

projects.name: Better Bing Image Downloader
projects.description: Python library + CLI to download Bing images at scale for dataset creation.
projects.problem: Collecting image datasets for ML was slow and manual.
projects.impact: 20+ GitHub stars; packaged as a CLI for repeatable dataset pulls.

projects.name: QuantQuips
projects.description: Backtesting + analytics toolkit with LLM-assisted workflows for exploration and reporting.
projects.problem: Quant research needed faster iteration from idea → backtest → insight sharing.
projects.impact: Praised by judges from JPMC for clarity and utility.

projects.name: RV Board
projects.description: Prototype board for students using an LPC2148 (ARM7) with low-level drivers in Embedded C and Assembly.
projects.problem: Needed an accessible platform for hands-on embedded systems labs.
projects.impact: Reusable board + driver stack for repeatable classroom experiments.

projects.name: Algorithmic-fusion-for-Lung-scan-classification
projects.description: Research on fusing CNN models for multi-class lung disease classification.
projects.problem: Single-model performance varied across imaging modalities and conditions.
projects.impact: Explored ensemble/fusion strategies and compared outcomes across datasets.

projects.name: HandWrittenTripSheet OCR
projects.description: Handwritten trip-sheet OCR pipeline (EasyOCR + regex post-processing).
projects.problem: Manual data entry for handwritten logistics documents was error-prone and slow.
projects.impact: Improved extraction accuracy by ~40% through post-processing and validation.

projects.name: Evaluation of filters in CT and Xray images of Lungs classification
projects.description: Study on how image filters impact CT/X-ray lung classification models.
projects.problem: Pre-processing choices can silently change model accuracy and bias.
projects.impact: Benchmarked filters and documented effects to guide reproducible pipelines.
